propActiveStep:
Set the active step (zero based index).
Defines which dot is highlighted when the variant is 'dots'.
propBackButton: A back button element. For instance, it can be a `Button` or an `IconButton`.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propNextButton: A next button element. For instance, it can be a `Button` or an `IconButton`.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesPositionBottom: Styles applied to the root element if `position="bottom"`.
stylesPositionTop: Styles applied to the root element if `position="top"`.
stylesPositionStatic: Styles applied to the root element if `position="static"`.
stylesDots: Styles applied to the dots container if `variant="dots"`.
stylesDot: Styles applied to each dot if `variant="dots"`.
stylesDotActive: Styles applied to a dot if `variant="dots"` and this is the active step.
stylesProgress: Styles applied to the Linear Progress component if `variant="progress"`.
